text: Léon Broers (born 14 April 1905, date of death unknown) was a Belgian long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Belgian male long-distance runners Category:Belgian male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Belgium Category:Place of birth missing
title: Léon Broers
